pages.text: The cymbidium is a flower known for its affinity with even the poorest of soils.

pages.title: Spreading
pages.text: The cymbidium, a flower closer to the earth than most, is encouraged to spread when on enchanted grass if stones are formed nearby from fluids. A novice floralist may struggle to find a way to dispose of, or even better, use the stones produced to their fullest.
Cymbidiums can also be crafted into brown dye, providing a renewable source to a floralist with a sharp mind.
